thumb.title: 【結月ゆかり】Doll (Give Me Everything)
thumb.description: DOWNLOAD : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1h3Be3NPWHW8Ul5rXunBkweg3cag5R0Xw/view?usp=drive_linkSTREAMS : https://share.amuse.io/Y_lSldNKSSaSLyrics: Give me, give me everything Give me, give me everything If you wanna take my heart, give me, give me everything If you wanna take my heart, give me, give me everything I really feel sorry for you Trapped in my illusion of my eternal love forever You can't touch me, you can't hold me, Even if you die just for me. Keep dancing on my hands Keep dancing in my hands 3, 2, 1, Serve me, praise me, love me And your life will be happy Control you as much as I please Just listen to me Can you feel it, the feeling of my love? But those are just words, you can't help but accept it! If you wanna take my heart,give me, give me everything If you wanna take my heart,give me, give me everything I really feel sorry for you Trapped in my illusion of my eternal love forever You can't touch me, you can't hold me, Even if you die just for me. Keep dancing on my hands Keep dancing on my hands Keep dancing on my hands
